data.persona: I am an acolyte.  I help with religious festivities.  I help the Bishop.
data.description:
You are in the Dungeon.
Dark and dreary, the dungeon hosts a portal for evil to access the netherworld. The moist dank smell casts doubt of goodness as you see the drab construct of jail cells lining the perimeter of the room.
There's a cells, a secret, a bone, and a portal for evil to access here.
The queen is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a Cloak.

data.short_motivation: I will cast an enchantment on the bone so it can be an evil-warding talisman for the queen
data.mid_motivation: I need the queen to be safe as the bishop and I conduct a ritual
data.long_motivation: I wish to help the bishop rid the castle and surrounding town of evil
